basics.name: Tarun Telang
basics.label: Strategy Leader | Business Growth | Tech-Education | Engineering & Blockchain Expert
basics.summary: Strategy and business leader with 20+ years driving growth across tech-education, SaaS, and PropTech verticals. Proven success in consulting (MBB) and startup strategy/business roles, leading cross-functional teams and executing high-impact projects. Expert in solving complex, ambiguous problems, incubating new opportunities, and scaling businesses profitably. Experience spans Scaler-like environments, Sequoia/Tiger-backed startups, and global tech organizations.

location.region: Available for Remote Work - All Time Zones

work.name: Lets Practice Academy
work.summary: Leading technology strategy and distributed engineering teams for blockchain-powered EdTech platform with real estate certification modules and tokenized credentials
highlights: Architected and delivered blockchain-based property certification system using Ethereum and Polygon, enabling secure tokenized real estate credentials and automated compliance checking
Led distributed engineering team of 15+ developers across frontend (React, Next.js, TypeScript), backend (Node.js, Go, Python), and blockchain (Solidity, Web3.js) specializations
Implemented smart contracts for automated course completion verification and revenue sharing, processing $500K+ in tokenized transactions
Designed scalable microservices architecture with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis, handling 100K+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime and real-time data processing
Established comprehensive DevOps practices using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), reducing deployment time by 75%
Integrated AI/ML recommendation engine with GraphQL APIs, improving user engagement by 45% and platform stickiness
Managed technical budgets and resource allocation for $1.5M+ development initiatives with full P&L responsibility
Implemented monitoring and logging infrastructure using Grafana, Prometheus, and New Relic for 24/7 system observability

work.name: Highspot
work.summary: Led engineering teams developing enterprise SaaS platform with blockchain integration, advanced analytics, and real-time data processing for Fortune 500 clients
highlights: Managed distributed engineering teams of 12+ developers in fully remote environment across multiple global time zones, establishing Agile/Scrum practices and sprint management processes
Architected and delivered AI-powered content analytics platform using Node.js, Express.js, and GraphQL, processing 10M+ documents daily with real-time insights
Implemented blockchain-based document verification system with smart contracts for enterprise data authenticity and audit trails
Led technical strategy for platform scalability using AWS, Azure infrastructure supporting Fortune 500 customers with multi-million user bases and 99.99% SLA requirements
Established comprehensive security frameworks including penetration testing, encryption protocols, and compliance systems for enterprise data handling
Drove adoption of cloud-native technologies and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), reducing infrastructure costs by 40% while improving performance
Mentored senior engineers and technical leads through code reviews and technical decision-making, achieving 80% internal promotion rate
Integrated payment processing systems and automated billing workflows for enterprise subscription management

work.name: OYO (PropTech Division)
work.position: Senior Manager, Technology - Real Estate Platform
work.summary: Led development of comprehensive real estate technology platform serving global property management, tokenization, and blockchain-based booking systems
highlights: Architected property management platform serving 100K+ hotels and vacation rentals globally with integrated MLS capabilities and real estate APIs
Led engineering teams developing PropTech solutions including property tokenization, automated escrow systems, and smart contract-driven lease agreements
Implemented blockchain-based identity verification and property ownership tracking using Ethereum smart contracts and IPFS storage
Designed and deployed real-time property availability and pricing systems using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Redis, handling 1M+ property searches daily
Integrated virtual tour capabilities and 3D property visualization tools, increasing booking conversion rates by 35%
Established security best practices for handling property transaction data, implementing multi-sig wallet systems and compliance frameworks
Developed automated compliance checking systems for property regulations across multiple countries and jurisdictions
Led cross-functional collaboration with product managers, UX/UI designers, and business stakeholders to align technical execution with PropTech market requirements

work.name: Polycom (Acquired by Plantronics)
work.summary: Led engineering teams developing cloud-native communication platforms with blockchain integration for secure enterprise communications and distributed team collaboration
highlights: Managed distributed engineering teams of 10+ developers building scalable cloud communication platforms using microservices architecture with Go, Node.js, and Python
Architected secure communication protocols and implemented blockchain-based identity management for enterprise clients with global distributed teams
Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture using Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure), improving system scalability by 300%
Implemented real-time communication APIs and WebRTC integration with React and TypeScript frontend applications for seamless user experience
Established comprehensive monitoring and alerting systems using Grafana and Prometheus, achieving 99.9% uptime for mission-critical communication services
Drove technical decision-making for platform architecture, technology stack selection, and development best practices across multiple product lines
Collaborated with remote teams across US, Europe, and Asia, establishing effective Agile/Scrum processes and sprint management for distributed development
Implemented automated testing, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment strategies reducing release cycles from months to weekly deployments

work.name: Oracle
work.summary: Led technical architecture and development of enterprise-grade database and cloud platforms with early blockchain research and distributed systems expertise
highlights: Architected large-scale distributed database systems and cloud infrastructure supporting enterprise clients with petabyte-scale data processing requirements
Led research and development of early blockchain technologies for enterprise data integrity and distributed consensus mechanisms
Designed and implemented high-performance backend systems using Java, Python, and Go with PostgreSQL and Oracle Database integration
Established security frameworks and encryption protocols for enterprise data protection and compliance with regulatory requirements
Mentored junior engineers and technical leads, establishing coding standards and technical review processes across the engineering organization
Collaborated with product management and enterprise customers to define technical requirements and platform roadmap for cloud migration initiatives
Implemented automated testing frameworks and performance optimization strategies, improving system throughput by 250%
